text: The Iraq National Library and Archive is the national library of Iraq and a national archive. It is in Baghdad. After the Iraq war in 2003 and the collapse of the Saddam Hussein regime, the library was burned. In 2007, it was opened again after restoration. == References == == Other websites == * Saad Eskander's Iraq diary * Photos of the Iraq National Library 2003â€“08 * Rebuilding Iraq's Once-Prized Library by Lourdes Garcia-Navarro * Iraq National Library fire Category:National libraries in Asia Category:National archives in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Baghdad
title: Iraq National Library and Archive
